summary: Joey Lauren Adams  is an American actress.
full_text:
Joey Adams , born Joseph Abramowitz, was an American comedian who was inducted into the New York Friars' Club in 1977 and wrote the book Borscht Belt in 1973.
^ Owen Moritz."Comic legend Joey Adams, the fastest joke teller in the East", nydailynews.com, December 3, 1999; accessed October 25, 2015.
title: Joey Adams
